description: Ground floor removal of non original dado rail, addition of new timber panelling to dado height to entrance hall and main stairs; front reception room  new full height timber panelling, built in shelving, replacement central column and beam surround, built in recessed shelving either side of chimney breast / fireplace: false circular columns, rear reception room french windows replacement of non existing original with new: entrance lobby / hall replacement of existing solid non original door and glazed arched window above with new timber glazed door and rectangular window above. First floor replacement of non original dado rail with new timber panelling to dado height as proposed at ground floor; non original double height mezzanine room relocation of non original entrance & door with new to side; non original double height mezzanine room replacement of internal stairs with new in same position
